data.title: Demographics, Census & Reports
data.meta_description: Find Demographics and Census information for the City of McKinney, produced by the city and the Census Bureau.
data.text:
Demographics

The information below offers general demographic information, produced by city staff, NCTCOG and the U.S. Census Bureau.

View Population Memo

Demographics - as of January 1, 2024

Population: 214,810

Median Household Income: $113,286

Workplace Population: 66,851

Gender: 50.2% Male | 49.8% Female

Median Age: 36.5 Male | 37 Female

Education: 94.8% High School | 52.2% Bachelorâ€™s | 17.7% Graduate

Source: 2022 American Community Survey and the City of McKinney

Census

The U.S. Census Bureau conducts the Decennial Census of the national population every ten years. The 2020 Census was conducted over the course of several months, and information from this census will be released over the next several years.
